_a-0000ebc5-ba33-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_HomePage_FAQ

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent
_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: a!match(
                value: ri!type,
                equals: "SUCCESS",
                then: "check-circle",
                equals: "ERROR",
                then: "exclamation-circle",
                equals: "WARN",
                then: "warning",
                default: "info-circle"
              ),
              color: a!match(
                value: ri!type,
                equals: "SUCCESS",
                then: ri!brandingMap.PositiveAccentColor,
                equals: "ERROR",
                then: ri!brandingMap.NegativeAccentColor,
                equals: "WARN",
                then: ri!brandingMap.WarningAccentColor,
                default: ri!brandingMap.InfoAccentColor
              ),
              size: "MEDIUM"
            )
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          showWhen: ri!showIcon = true
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: ri!message, size: "STANDARD")
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4a5a2804-42aa-4e8c-a334-2d0f23f402b4"
                },
                style: { "STRONG" },
                link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(
                  uri: rule!CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl().authedPath & "/sites/" & cons!CMGT_LA_TXT_URL_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER & "/page/cases",
                  openLinkIn: "SAME_TAB"
                ),
                linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
              ),
              char(32),
              char(32),
              char(32),
              char(32)
            },
            showWhen: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!showMyCasesLink,
              default: false()
            )
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE"
        ),

      },
      alignVertical: "MIDDLE",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "LESS"
    )
  },
  height: "AUTO",
  style: if(
    ri!showBackground = true,
    a!match(
      value: ri!type,
      equals: "SUCCESS",
      then: ri!brandingMap.PositiveBackgroundColor,
      equals: "ERROR",
      then: ri!brandingMap.NegativeBackgroundColor,
      equals: "WARN",
      then: ri!brandingMap.WarningBackgroundColor,
      default: ri!brandingMap.InfoBackgroundColor
    ),
    ri!brandingMap.WhiteColor
  ),
  marginBelow: "NONE",
  showBorder: false,
  decorativeBarPosition: "START",
  decorativeBarColor: a!match(
    value: ri!type,
    equals: "SUCCESS",
    then: ri!brandingMap.PositiveAccentColor,
    equals: "ERROR",
    then: ri!brandingMap.NegativeAccentColor,
    equals: "WARN",
    then: ri!brandingMap.WarningAccentColor,
    default: ri!brandingMap.InfoAccentColor
  )
)

_a-0000ebce-f0a8-8000-9cb7-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_Data_FAQ

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_ActionsAndLinks

_a-0000ec34-784f-8000-9cd6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_LA_ClaimCaseDisplayLink
_a-0000ec34-784f-8000-9cd6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
  tooltip: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9f595600-9750-4407-a85c-3915147ac978",
  value: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: upper(
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9f595600-9750-4407-a85c-3915147ac978"
      ),
      color: a!defaultValue(ri!linkColor, ri!brandingMap.WhiteColor),
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(
        label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Claim Case"),
        uri: rule!CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl().authedPath & "/sites/" & cons!CMGT_LA_TXT_URL_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER & "/page/" & cons!CMGT_SELF_URL_STUB_SITE_PAGE_CLAIM_CASE,
        openLinkIn: "SAME_TAB"
      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
    )
  },
  showWhen: a!defaultValue(ri!showActions, false),
  align: "CENTER",
  marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
  preventWrapping: true()
)

_a-0000ee1d-9667-8000-9d8a-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_HomePage_FAQCard

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_SitePages_HeaderLayout
_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!wideScreen: {
    "TABLET_LANDSCAPE",
    "DESKTOP_NARROW",
    "DESKTOP",
    "DESKTOP_WIDE"
  },
  local!isWide: if(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"(local!wideScreen),
    true,
    false
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headerContentLayout"(
    header: {
      rule!CMGT_LA_BillboardLayout(
        headerBackgroundImage: ri!headerBackgroundImage,
        height: ri!height,
        isWide: local!isWide,
        title: ri!title,
        brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
        description: ri!description,
        headerImage: ri!headerImage,
        showHeader: ri!showHeader,
        showActions: ri!showActions
      )
    },
    contents: ri!contents,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.DefaultBackgroundColor
  )
)

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap

_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl
_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!authedPath: cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
    extract(linktodocument(0, "doc"), """", "/doc/")
  ),
  local!subdomainWithDomain: extract(local!authedPath, "//", "/suite")[1],
  local!subdomain: split(local!subdomainWithDomain, ".")[1],
  a!map(
    subdomain: local!subdomain,
    authedPath: local!authedPath,
    subdomainWithDomain: local!subdomainWithDomain
  )
)

_a-0000ee1d-9667-8000-9d8a-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_BillboardLayout

_a-0000ebc5-ba33-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_LA_SitePage_ClaimCase

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_BannerForClaimCase
_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!claimStatus),
  a!match(
    value: ri!claimStatus,
    equals: "CASE_NOT_FOUND",
    then: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "ERROR",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:5ae7310c-ae2e-4f96-b73e-4dacc31e22ca",
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    ),
    equals: "CASE_ALREADY_CLAIMED",
    then: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "INFO",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4ee9eeee-e2bf-4344-9692-47bbc0710624",
      showMyCasesLink: true(),
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    ),
    equals: "CASE_CLAIMED",
    then: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "SUCCESS",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:25a63ceb-c6b6-4c09-b73c-291e7191ea62",
      showMyCasesLink: true(),
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    ),
    default: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "WARN",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:11635be5-9841-4e72-9abc-3e0b2acd145c",
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    )
  ),
  {}
)
